decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (KD/PP/GARAGE/45/17/C-215.3; KD/PP/GARAGE/45/17/C-215.1. Received 06/08/2017. KD/PP/GARAGE/45/17/C-215.2. Received 08/08/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the eastern wall of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding building hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 114 Chatsworth Crescent and it shall not be used for separate living accommodation or for any business purpose
description: Erection of a single storey detached outbuilding
